<!-- Generated by agents-reverse-engineer v1.0.1 -->

# src/types

`src/types/` defines core TypeScript interfaces for file discovery, exclusion tracking, and process statistics used across the `agents-reverse-engineer` codebase.

## Contents

- [`index.ts`](./index.ts): Exports `ExcludedFile`, `DiscoveryResult`, and `DiscoveryStats` interfaces representing file discovery metadata and aggregated metrics.

## API Surface

**`ExcludedFile`**: `{ path: string, reason: string }` — captures file exclusion metadata  
**`DiscoveryResult`**: `{ files: string[], excluded: ExcludedFile[] }` — discovery process output  
**`DiscoveryStats`**: `{ totalFiles: number, includedFiles: number, excludedFiles: number, exclusionReasons: Record<string, number> }` — aggregated statistics with exclusion breakdown

## File Relationships

`index.ts` is imported by discovery orchestration (`src/discovery/run.ts`), filtering logic (`src/discovery/filters/`), and CLI commands (`src/cli/discover.ts`) to type-check discovery outputs and exclusion tracking.
